comment._content: Riktigt snygg bild. Tänk att Carl var så tekniskt duktig på den tiden, med den utrustningen!

comment.author: 35017456@N03
comment._content: Is there a way to get a higher resolution image of this one? Like, big enough to fit an A4 @ 300 dpi?

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Simon Birky Hartmann:  You may order it by mail to kmb@raa.se. You'll get it without costs, as a digital file, or on cd if you add a postal address. (It's database image name is CC000413)

/Anna B.

comment.author: 35017456@N03
comment._content: Thanks Anna! I'm doing this right now.
